channel.title: apple tv on Konigi
channel.description: Recent content in apple tv on Konigi

item.title: Apple TV 2.0 Review
item.description: Apple TV owners got a software update pushed to their boxes this week, and Gizmodo has a review of the software complete with screenshots and a description of the rental and purchase services now offered. I was a bit disappointed by the update at first, but like my 6 year old son said on the second day, "I'm getting used to it." Gone is the simple, single panel with left/right hierarchical navigation.
